text: Sargans is a municipality in Sarganserland in the canton of St. Gallen in Switzerland. As of December 2016, 6,063 people lived there. Sargans is known for its castle, which dates from before the founding of the Swiss Confederation in 1291. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Sarganserland Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Sargans
